name: Casa De Garcia - Maduro Blend - Robusto
additionalNotes: The Maduro is a premium, quality, top-shelf smoke set at a modest price. This variation in the Casa de Garcia portfolio is composed with aged Dominican and Honduran long filler tobaccos, a Connecticut Broadleaf binder, and a sweet Connecticut Shade wrapper that is sun-ripened until it is almost black in color. You will find mellow flavors of cocoa, creamy chocolate, cedar, and just a hint of spice in this smooth cigar.
